price: 5. Soki atiki bino, Nkolo naye akobalisa ye basi ya malamu koleka bino, bamisokia, bandimi, bazali na botosi, batubelaka, baye bazali kosambela, bakangi ya ngizi, baye babala liboso, mpe bangondo (baye bayebi mibali te) te.
arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُۥٓ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبۡدِلَهُۥٓ أَزۡوَٰجًا خَيۡرٗا مِّنكُنَّ مُسۡلِمَٰتٖ مُّؤۡمِنَٰتٖ قَٰنِتَٰتٖ تَٰٓئِبَٰتٍ عَٰبِدَٰتٖ سَٰٓئِحَٰتٖ ثَيِّبَٰتٖ وَأَبۡكَارٗا

version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
